sqlMap.select: SELECT AREA_CODE AS areaCode , GS_CU_CODE AS customerCode , GS_DATE AS collectDate , GS_SNO AS sequenceNumber , GS_SUKUMTYPE AS collectTypeCode , Su_Name AS collectTypeName , REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(15), ISNULL(GS_KUMACK, 0),1),'.00','') AS collectAmount , REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(15), ISNULL(GS_DC, 0),1),'.00','') AS discountAmount , GS_SW_CODE AS employeeCode , GS_SW_NAME AS employeeName , GS_BIGO AS remark FROM $catalogName$.dbo.fn_BOOK_CJ_SUKUM('$areaCode$','$customerCode$','$startDate$','$endDate$') WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY AREA_CODE, GS_CU_CODE, GS_DATE, GS_SNO
